title: Improved maximin fair allocation of indivisible items to three agents
description: Fair division of $m$ indivisible items among 3 agents with additive valuations.
results: An allocation of goods exists where agent 1 gets at least her proportional share and the other agents get at least 11/12 of their maximin share.
An allocation of chores exists where agent 1 gets at most her proportional share and the other agents get at most 19/18 of their maximin share.
